title: How to Make Moro Bar Slice

steps.headline: Place the Moro bars and butter together in a saucepan.
Gently melt the bars and butter over low heat.
steps.description: Stir to distribute the melting bar evenly.

steps.headline: Add the rice bubbles to the melted mixture.
Allow to cool.
steps.description: Press the mixture into a lined, shallow baking dish. If wished, ice with chocolate icing.

steps.headline: Place in the fridge for half an hour to set.
Score into evenly shaped slices (bars).
steps.description: Cut slices and serve. Although it's rich, it won't last long because it's so yummy but if you do have any left over, simply store in an airtight container.

text: Place the Moro bars and butter together in a saucepan.  Gently melt the bars and butter over low heat. Stir to distribute the melting bar evenly. Remove from the heat.  Add the rice bubbles to the melted mixture. Stir through well. Allow to cool. Press the mixture into a lined, shallow baking dish. If wished, ice with chocolate icing. Place in the fridge for half an hour to set.  Score into evenly shaped slices (bars). Cut slices and serve. Although it's rich, it won't last long because it's so yummy but if you do have any left over, simply store in an airtight container.
